attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nationalise Public Transport and subsidise it. I can't understand why Government ministers think that clean reliable public transport is the answer to getting people out of cars. My car is also clean and reliable. Continental Countries have very cheap and reliable public transport which is polular and well used and state owned.

rejection.details: Please replace the name in the petition title with a call to action for HM Government.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
